attributes.action: Create a Remembrance Day bank holiday on Monday after Remembrance Sunday in Nov
attributes.additional_details:
It will be an opportunity for families to be together to share memories and visit places of remembrance e.g. cemeteries, favourite places, etc.

It will also break up the long period between August bank holiday and Christmas. Also it could delay inappropriately early Christmas advertising as businesses focus on this holiday.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

A national holiday and day of remembrance for those lost in the COVID pandemic: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568631

An annual day of remembrance and memorial for the victims of the COVID-19 virus: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561869
